tab1.text1: <TextStyle.Yellow>If you notice a problem, something is out of balance or if you have some wishes, please let us know!</>

tab2.text1:
- We are currently working on the fine-tuning for pvp
- Create items/kits for new players and integrate them into an ingame store system
- Working on server trailers and advertising
tab2.text2:
- <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Crossmaps</> in the PvP area (starting with Scortch Earth)
- If wished also in the PvE area
- <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Our focus</> is on 2 Man & 4 Man PvP Server
- A fair INGAME <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">store system</> to better integrate <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">new</> or <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">wiped players</> into the game.
- <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Events</> (if there are enough players)
- PvP Season with videos for the community
- Trailer videos of the server maps
- Discord development
- Create our own community mod

tab3.text1:
- 10x EXP
- 10x Farming
- 10x Taming (5x with 2x eat)
- 40x Maturation | 20x Hatching
- 15x Item stack | RawPrimeMeat up to 5
- 25x Weight for Player/Dino
- 4 man Tribe + 1 Alliance
- No Mindwipe cooldown
- Maximum wild dino level 150
- Maximum player level 105
- Enough points for all Engrams
- No movement speed leveling
- Cave building allowed (6x structure damage in caves)
- Turrets in range place limit 150
- 30 sec PVP respawn cooldown (not stacking) for YEET actions
- Force wild dino respawn on server restart is enabled
tab3.text2:
Check out our other servers:

<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">PVP</>
- RTR [EU] -PVP- x10 | 2Man | Starter Kits | >2<

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">PVE</>
- RTR [EU] -PVE- x5 | Shop | NoWipe | >3<
tab3.text3:
Server restart <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">every day 6 AM</>

- Only wild dino get wiped after restart
- NO WIPE for tamed dinos, boss dinos (tek cave), sleeping dinos, and dinos actively being tamed

tab4.text1:
#1 - If you notice character lagging/rubberband after join

#2 - Flying with Pteranodon feels laggy
tab4.text2:
#1 - You have to die or travel between beds

#2 - Wait for fix...
